newsitem.title: USA: Firearms Training to buy SBS unit.
newsitem.headline: Firearms Training to buy SBS unit.

text.p: Firearms Training Systems Inc said Wednesday its FATS Inc operating unit has signed a letter of intent to buy ICAT Judgmental Use of Force from SBS Technologies Inc.
Terms of the sale were not disclosed.
FATS provides interactive firearms training systems to military and law enforcement agencies, it said.
SBS said the ICAT unit was "not material to the performance of SBS."
